channel.description: The Linux Firewall Review Questions Q. A firewall can be configured between two networks but not between two hosts. True or False? A. False. A firewall can also be configured between two host computers. Q. After changing the default firewalld zone to internal, what would you run to verify? A. You run firewall-cmd --get-default-zone for validation. Q. What is the process of data packet formation called? A. The process of data packet formation is called encapsulation.
